entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing rain. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
